title: 5g usage reports itself as 9g
body:
Minor... 5g reports itself as '9g' in its usage line.

5g's galign.c does have thechar = '5', but apparently that's not being picked up...

bradfitz@mini:~$ 5a
usage: 5a [-options] file.s

bradfitz@mini:~$ 5l
usage: 5l [-E entry] [-H head] [-L dir] [-T text] [-D data] [-R rnd] [-r path] [-o out]
main.5

bradfitz@mini:~$ 5g
usage: 9g [flags] file.go...
flags:


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

linux / arm

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

b761e0299e9b+ release.2010-07-01/release
